section.name: Screenshots
section.p: These are the screenshots of a JMoney sample file using the Kunststoff look and feel.

subsection.name: Account entries view
subsection.p: This view shows the book entries of an account. Entries may be added, deleted and manipulated.

subsection.name: Account properties view
subsection.p: The properties of an account are in a separate tab.

subsection.name: Categories view
subsection.p: To each book entry a category may be assigned. This is used to generate reports or to make transfers to another account
